H0.text: Covalent bonds are formed between atoms that share electrons.

H1.text: Neutron bonds are the type of bonds formed between atoms sharing electrons.

H2.text: Hydroxyl are the type of bonds formed between atoms sharing electrons.

H3.text: Ionic bonds are formed between atoms sharing electrons.

A4.text: A covalent bond is a chemical bond that involves the sharing of electrons to form electron pairs between atoms.
